hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Special
hasMenuItem.description:
Turkey sandwich with daily soup or side salad. Daily soups- Soups are only available on given days. Please specify what soup you would like. 

Monday- Chicken Noodle soup or Cream of Tomato soup 
Tuesday- Turkey Vegetable soup or Cream of Mushroom soup 
Wednesday- Beef Vegetable soup or Cream of Broccoli soup 
Thursday- Vegetable soup or Split Pea with Ham soup
 Friday- Turkey Vegetable soup or Clam Chowder soup.

review.reviewBody: Maybe the best sandwich I have eaten from Door Dash way better than " franchised sandwiches'. My  turkey was so tasty and moist . The soup was tasty and piping hot.  . Will definite order again.

Hands down the offices favorite place to order lunch! We have placed several orders now, each with at least 14 items. Everything has consistently been perfect. Everything is super tasty, it always arrives quickly and without any errors! Chicken taco salad, Mexican Burrito,  and the super stacked sandwiches are our favorites, especially the chicken or turkey club.
Super tasty! Would order again. My only two cents would be that for the price it should come with a side, and the turkey needs more mayo and cranberry sauce otherwise it can be a bit dry.
Amazing sandwich, as usual. Best in the city!
